title: My mother is a holistic health practitioner. Does the COVID-19 vaccine leave behind detectable traces in my body of any kind? I want to g...
description: Answer (1 of 7): No. The vaccine is basically a blueprint for a tiny piece of the virus (zero chance of it acting like a virus). The cell makes it into proteins that the immune system recognizes as a threat and develops immunity to it. Since nothing in the body is making more of that "blueprint",...
